medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms begun one day prior to admission with epigastric abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting (non-bloody, non-bilious), and diarrhea (non-bloody, brown, watery).
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type ___ DM (diet controlled), HTN, Left breast CA s/p lumpectomy, Gastric cancer - Stage III, s/p gastrectomy, GERD, osteoporosis, arthritis, tinnitus, Fe deficient anemia, cataract.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died from unspecified cancer, father died of natural causes, sister has Type ___ DM, no family history of CAD.
